Description: Generates an MVC Area with controllers and

Options.Name: dbContext
Options.Description: Name of the DbContext to use, or generate (if it does not exist).

Options.Name: files
Options.Description: List of semicolon separated files to scaffold. Use the --list-files option to see the available options.

Options.Name: listFiles
Options.Description: Lists the files that can be scaffolded by using the '--files' option.

Options.Name: userClass
Options.Description: Name of the User class to generate.

Options.Name: useSqLite
Options.Description: Flag to specify if DbContext should use SQLite instead of SQL Server.

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: Use this option to overwrite existing files.

Options.Name: useDefaultUI
Options.Description: Use this option to setup identity and to use Default UI.

Options.Name: layout
Options.Description: Specify a custom layout file to use.

Options.Name: generateLayout
Options.Description: Use this option to generate a new _Layout.cshtml
